profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
Thank you for visiting Envirotech Insulation and Envirotech Electrical Services Inc.   
 
We are a dual service organization, offering a full range of electrical services for commercial and residential, along with specializing in retrofit wall insulation, attic insulation, and garage ceiling insulation applications. We also offer removal of insulation. 
 
Over 28 years licensed in the electrical trade, with experience in residential, commercial, industrial, microfit and net metering solar installations, backup generators, Generlink transfer switches, aluminum wiring.  A member of the ACP program for electrical contractors, we can take care of all your electrical needs.
 
**We were the preferred electrical contractor for HGTV's DECKED OUT during their last season.**
 
Envirotech Insulation specializes in installing cellulose in walls, cavities, knee walls, garage ceilings, attics, and other area that might be inaccessible without having to remove plaster, or drywall.  Through infrared we can identify problem areas of air leakage, and missing or lack of insulation to help suggest the proper recommendations for increasing the energy efficiency and comfort in your home. We also offer dense packed cellulose insulation for soundproofing/noise reduction applications. We ensure intake venting is appropriate from the soffits, and exhaust fan are connected properly.  
www.envirotechinsulation.ca
 
Please contact us for an estimate, and to learn more about the products and services we offer

profile:
Celluloseman Inc. has a unique, state-of-the-art vacuum designed to quickly, effectively, and safely remove all types of attic insulation, as well as high-powered equipment to efficiently replace or add in cellulose or fiberglass insulation.

For more than a decade, Celluloseman Inc. has been a frontrunner in southwestern Ontario’s residential insulation industry. We specialize in insulation extraction and insulation installation, making homes safer, more comfortable, and more affordable to live in. Our highly experienced and licensed technicians will gladly walk you through the process and recommend ways to make your home more energy efficient, as well as address concerns like mold remediation, (vermiculite removal) asbestos abatement, air sealing, draft and soundproofing.

Celluloseman’s expertise and reliability have made us a sought-after insulation contractor in the GTA. We assisted with the insulation removal from hundreds of homes damaged by the catastrophic Sunrise Propane explosion in 2008, and participated in the cleanup effort after a tornado ripped through more than 600 homes in the city of Vaughan in 2011. In 2019, Celluloseman was featured in HGTV's Property Brothers: Forever Home in Season 2. 

All of our technicians are fully licensed and insured, ready to provide quality, dependable service backed by a one-year guarantee. For home insulation in Toronto, Mississauga, Burlington and surrounding areas, Celluloseman can’t be beat.

Our client-first model sets us apart.

FREE Estimates
 
Thermal Shield Insulation Inc. is a professional insulation service provider. We have been servicing the Greater Toronto region and surrounding areas since 2010.

We value each and every one of our clients and look not only to satisfy but to exceed expectations with every job we undertake. profile:
Roma Heat and Cool is an Italian professional Insulation company servicing the building and construction industries for over 14 years. We provide full-service systems, spray foam polyurethane foam installation, fiberglass/rockwool batt insulation, blow-in attic insulation, removal insulation, drywall, and taping. We only use the SAFEST Chemical Free Canadian Approved materials and pride ourselves in customer service and satisfaction.
 
We service the areas of Toronto and surrounding areas including but not limited to Newmarket, Gwillimbury, Aurora, Scarborough, and Woodbridge.
 
For more information, please visit our website or call us at 647-835-0024 for a free estimate!
